response.original_title: 打ち上げ花火、下から見るか？横から見るか？
response.overview: Moshimo, Japan. The annual fireworks festival is about to take place and a group of schoolboys, arguing over whether they are round or flat when viewed from different angles, set out to find it out.
response.tagline: If only I could return to that moment.
response.title: Fireworks

titles.title: Uchiage hanabi, shita kara miru ka? Yoko kara miru ka?
Fireworks. Do You Want to See Them From Below or From the Side?
Fireworks, Should We See It From the Side or the Bottom?
쏘아올린 불꽃, 밑에서 볼까？ 옆에서 볼까？

打ち上げ花火, 下から見るか, 横から見るか
升空的焰火，从下面看？还是从侧面看？
